item.title: Trump says heâ€™ll send National Guard to Chicago, but details remain unclear
item.description: President Donald Trump has authorized the deployment of 300 National Guard members to Chicago, where on the same day Border Patrol agents shot and injured a woman they said tried to run them over.

item.title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump administration from deploying troops in Portland, Oregon
Fears of massive battery fires spark local opposition to energy storage projects
